statements: SELECT * FROM child_custody_cases;
SELECT case_id, child_name, parent1_name FROM child_custody_cases WHERE custody_status='Joint';
SELECT parent1_name, parent2_name FROM child_custody_cases WHERE child_name='Alice';
SELECT * FROM child_custody_cases WHERE parent1_name='John' OR parent2_name='Mary';
SELECT child_name, parent1_name, parent2_name FROM child_custody_cases ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM child_custody_cases WHERE custody_status = 'active';
SELECT child_name, parent1_name FROM child_custody_cases WHERE parent2_name = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT * FROM child_custody_cases WHERE parent1_name = 'John Smith' AND custody_status = 'active';
SELECT parent1_name, parent2_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM child_custody_cases GROUP BY parent1_name, parent2_name;
SELECT child_name, parent1_name, parent2_name FROM child_custody_cases ORDER BY child_name DESC, parent1_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM child_custody_cases;
SELECT case_id, child_name, custodial_parent FROM child_custody_cases;
SELECT family_id, parent1_name, parent2_name, children_count FROM family_dynamics;
SELECT * FROM child_custody_cases WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT parent1_name, parent2_name, income_amount FROM family_dynamics WHERE income_amount > 50000;
SELECT child_name, start_date, end_date FROM child_custody_cases WHERE custodial_parent = 'John Smith';
SELECT child_name, start_date, end_date, custodial_parent FROM child_custody_cases WHERE social_worker = 'Sarah Johnson' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT family_id, parent1_name, parent2_name, children_count FROM family_dynamics WHERE income_amount > 50000 AND housing_type = 'Single-Family Home';
SELECT family_id, parent1_name, parent2_name, children_count, income_amount FROM family_dynamics WHERE housing_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY income_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM child_custody_cases c JOIN family_dynamics f ON c.custodial_parent = f.parent1_name WHERE f.children_count >= 3 ORDER BY f.income_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM child_care_cases;
SELECT case_id, child_name, date_opened FROM child_care_cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_summary FROM child_care_cases WHERE case_status = 'open';
SELECT member_name, age FROM family_members WHERE relationship = 'parent';
SELECT note_text, author, created_at FROM case_notes WHERE case_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM child_care_cases WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT case_id, child_name FROM child_care_cases WHERE date_opened > '2022-01-01';
SELECT family_id, member_name, age FROM family_members WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT note_id, note_text, author FROM case_notes WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM child_care_cases cc JOIN family_members fm ON cc.case_id = fm.family_id WHERE cc.case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM ChildCases;
SELECT case_id, child_name, case_status FROM ChildCases WHERE case_status='active';
SELECT member_id, member_name, age FROM FamilyMembers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT history_id, event_date, outcome FROM CaseHistory WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT family_id, family_name, total_members FROM FamilyDynamics WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM ChildCases WHERE case_status='Open';
SELECT child_name, guardian_name FROM ChildCases WHERE case_id=3;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM CaseHistory WHERE outcome='Resolved';
SELECT family_name, address, city FROM FamilyDynamics WHERE total_members>5;
SELECT member_name, age, relationship FROM FamilyMembers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM child;
SELECT name, age FROM child WHERE age > 5;
SELECT * FROM parent ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT occupation FROM parent;
SELECT assessment_id, result FROM assessment WHERE result = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM child ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT parent_id, name, occupation FROM parent WHERE occupation='Teacher';
SELECT a.assessment_id, a.date, a.result, c.name as child_name, p.name as parent_name FROM assessment a JOIN custody_case c ON a.case_id = c.case_id JOIN parent p ON c.parent_id = p.parent_id;

SELECT c.name as child_name, p.name as parent_name, s.specialization FROM custody_case cc JOIN child c ON cc.child_id = c.child_id JOIN parent p ON cc.parent_id = p.parent_id JOIN social_worker s ON s.worker_id = '1234-5678-9012-3456';
SELECT p.*, c.*, a.result FROM parent p JOIN custody_case c ON p.parent_id = c.parent_id LEFT JOIN assessment a ON c.case_id = a.case_id ORDER BY a.date DESC;
